mods.name: Globeadue 20 Slot Dropship
mods.author: globeadue
mods.description: Sets the dropship to 20 inventory slots

mods.name: Globeadue Husk Epoxy
mods.author: globeadue
mods.description: Adds recipe to make epoxy using 20 sap and 1 caveworm husk

mods.name: Globeadue Iron Shotgun Shells
mods.author: globeadue
mods.description: Adds recipee to make shotgun shells with iron instead of copper

mods.name: Globeadue MXC Toolbox
mods.author: globeadue
mods.description: Replaces the MXC Crate option in workshop with a MXC Toolbox consumable. Consuming produces a collection of the base MXC tools(axe, pick etc), a MXC Cot, Led Flashlight, a MXC crate and a MXC campfire. A bit of comet coal included for the campfire.

mods.name: Globeadue Reploter
mods.author: globeadue
mods.description: Adds a recipe that takes a normal farm plot and outputs a normal farm plot. This allows you to apply your farm plot talents without having to destroy the farm plot and recraft it, loosing half the materials.

mods.name: Globeadue Seed Starter
mods.author: globeadue
mods.description: This mod reimages most of the seed packet tree in the workshop. See readme for full details.

mods.name: Globeadue Shields
mods.author: globeadue
mods.description: Adds an Aluminium Shield that is tougher than the wood shield and returns a little bit dmg back to the attacker.

mods.name: Globeadue Wood 2 Sap
mods.author: globeadue
mods.description: Adds a recipe to the Woodcrafting bench to make sap out of wood logs. 1:3 Ratio
